original_text: That I may know him, and the power of his resurrection, and the fellowship of his sufferings, being made conformable unto his death;
korean_text: 내가 그리스도와 그 부활의 권능과 그 고난에 참여함을 알고자 하여 그의 죽으심을 본받아

sentences.original_text: and the power of his resurrection
and the fellowship of his sufferings
being made conformable unto his death
